meanings.definition: The quality or state of being awkward or clumsy.
meanings.sent1: Her unhandiness with the scissors made it difficult for her to cut a straight line.
meanings.sent2: His unhandiness on the dance floor was evident as he tripped over his own feet.
meanings.sent3: The unhandiness of the robot trying to pour a cup of tea was both amusing and frustrating.
meanings.sent4: The unhandiness of the newborn foal trying to stand up for the first time was endearing.
meanings.sent5: The unhandiness of the giant panda holding a delicate bamboo shoot was surprisingly graceful.
meanings.sent6: Despite her unhandiness, she managed to complete the puzzle with determination.
meanings.sent7: The unhandiness of the toddler trying to tie his shoelaces was adorable to watch.
meanings.sent8: The unhandiness of the clown juggling balls added an element of comedy to the performance.

meanings.definition: The lack of skill or ability in handling objects or performing tasks.
meanings.sent1: His unhandiness with tools often led to broken household items.
meanings.sent2: The unhandiness of the new employee was evident in the way he struggled to use the computer.
meanings.sent3: The unhandiness of the magician trying to pull a rabbit out of a hat resulted in a comical mishap.
meanings.sent4: The unhandiness of the chef with a knife made the kitchen a dangerous place.
meanings.sent5: The unhandiness of the mechanic fixing the car caused more problems than solutions.
meanings.sent6: Despite his unhandiness, he managed to assemble the furniture with patience.
meanings.sent7: The unhandiness of the child trying to tie a balloon animal was endearing to the party guests.
meanings.sent8: The unhandiness of the artist with a brush created a unique and abstract painting.
